categories: Category:Battles of the Yuuzhan Vong War

nodes.text: During the Yuuzhan Vong War, in which the empire of the extra-galactic Yuuzhan Vong species invaded the galaxy between the years 25 ABY and 29 ABY, the Vong attacked the Tsyk system within Hutt Space. The attack took place some time between the years 26 ABY and 27 ABY, and the Vong reached the system by traveling down the Hollastin Run hyperlane from a previous attack on the Hollastin system.

The attack on the Tsyk system was first shown in The Essential Atlas, a reference book released in 2009 and written by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace. The battle is not mentioned in the text of the book but is shown on a map called "Collapse of the Core" which details conflicts of the Yuuzhan Vong War that took place in the galaxy somewhen between 26 ABY and 27 ABY. No information is given about the outcome of the attack, although a separate map shows the Tsyk system was under Vong control by 27 ABY.
